main event: An auxiliary police officer and a civilian observed a bright, elongated object moving at high speed in the sky on August 20, 1969.
interesting points: The object was as bright as mercury vapor street lights., It appeared larger than the full moon and emitted blinding flashes of light., The observation was made while traveling in a vehicle., The object was seen for several minutes before disappearing., Witnesses noted that the object was not a typical airplane or satellite, and observed a glow in the sky even after it disappeared.
sighted object: a brilliant elongated object with flashes of light
witness description: an auxiliary police officer and a civilian
